revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 88:;Eutas, son of Sambas, grandson of Petheus, mother Ammonous, drachmas 20;;Hatres, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, copper drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapontos, drachmas 12;;Petaus, son of Petaus, grandson of Petheus, mother Isis, drachmas 16;;Pnepheros, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Besis, grandson of Thoteus, mother Heras, drachmas 8 copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the older, grandson of Thebennis, mother Tamarres, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Onnophris, son of Sambas, grandson of Onnophris, mother Eserempis, too old to pay poll tax, guard taxes drachmas 8 obols 8;;Petheus, son of Pakysis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamaron, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Dios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 12;;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Aunes, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaisas, drachmas 20 obols 24;;Sarapion, son of Onnophris, grandson of Maron, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 20;;Charidemos, son of Petoraipis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Kaladytes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, copper drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 364 obols 23.;Mesore 1:;Petesouchos, son of Heraklas, grandson of Heraklas, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 8;;Kastresis, slave of Thaisareion alias Nebsosis, copper drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Achillas, grandson of Kastor, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 12;;Kastor the younger, his brother of the same mother, drachmas 12;;Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 12;;Kastor alias Ptolemaios, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 12;;Gaius Sempronius Serenus (Sabeinos, son of Valens);;(in left margin: drachmas 108) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 14 obol 1, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2, naubion drachma 1 obols 2.5, surcharges drachmas 3 obol 0.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 9 obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 3 chalki 2, in total drachmas 31 obols 5.5;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 70 obols 5, surcharges drachmas 4 obols 3, in total drachmas 75 obols 2;;Gaia Valeria (Saturnilus, brother of Pankras);;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 28) eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2;;and land of the kleronomos Primogenes;;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2;;eparourion obols 3, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 4;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 8 obols 3, surcharges obols 3 chalki 2, in total drachmas 9 chalki 2;;and to Marcus Anthestius Capitolinus;;naubion of katoikoi of year 13 drachma 1, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obol1;;and to Didyme, daughter of Herakleides;;likewise naubion of katoikoi of year 13 obols 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2.5."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- BL III, 113 (on l. 8 a.o); BL III, 113 (on l. 3516) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
